name: Oil Pirate
description:
Game made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 44.

Explore, fight and survive in this thrilling escapade.
Choose one of the 3 distinct game modes, or let luck decide in Random Endless mode!
But be careful! Each hit makes you lose your precious barrels - 
without them, you're an easy target!
Your adventure starts now, Oil Pirate!

Controls:
W - forward
A/D - turn ship
Space - boost
Mouse - control crosshair
LMB - shoot (consumes 1 barrel)
